verses.verse: Whoso loveth <WH157> instruction <WH4148> loveth <WH157> knowledge <WH1847>: but he that hateth <WH8130> reproof <WH8433> is brutish <WH1198>.
A good <WH2896> man obtaineth <WH6329> favour <WH7522> of the LORD <WH3068>: but a man <WH376> of wicked devices <WH4209> will he condemn <WH7561>.
A man <WH120> shall not be established <WH3559> by wickedness <WH7562>: but the root <WH8328> of the righteous <WH6662> shall not be moved <WH4131>.
A virtuous <WH2428> woman <WH802> is a crown <WH5850> to her husband <WH1167>: but she that maketh ashamed <WH954> is as rottenness <WH7538> in his bones <WH6106>.
The thoughts <WH4284> of the righteous <WH6662> are right <WH4941>: but the counsels <WH8458> of the wicked <WH7563> are deceit <WH4820>.
The words <WH1697> of the wicked <WH7563> are to lie in wait <WH693> for blood <WH1818>: but the mouth <WH6310> of the upright <WH3477> shall deliver <WH5337> them.
The wicked <WH7563> are overthrown <WH2015>, and are not: but the house <WH1004> of the righteous <WH6662> shall stand <WH5975>.
A man <WH376> shall be commended <WH1984> according <WH6310> to his wisdom <WH7922>: but he that is of a perverse <WH5753> heart <WH3820> shall be despised <WH937>.
He that is despised <WH7034>, and hath a servant <WH5650>, is better <WH2896> than he that honoureth <WH3513> himself, and lacketh <WH2638> bread <WH3899>.
A righteous <WH6662> man regardeth <WH3045> the life <WH5315> of his beast <WH929>: but the tender mercies <WH7356> of the wicked <WH7563> are cruel <WH394>.
He that tilleth <WH5647> his land <WH127> shall be satisfied <WH7646> with bread <WH3899>: but he that followeth <WH7291> vain <WH7386> persons is void <WH2638> of understanding <WH3820>.
The wicked <WH7563> desireth <WH2530> the net <WH4685> of evil <WH7451> men: but the root <WH8328> of the righteous <WH6662> yieldeth <WH5414> fruit.
The wicked <WH7451> is snared <WH4170> by the transgression <WH6588> of his lips <WH8193>: but the just <WH6662> shall come out <WH3318> of trouble <WH6869>.

A man <WH376> shall be satisfied <WH7646> with good <WH2896> by the fruit <WH6529> of his mouth <WH6310>: and the recompence <WH1576> of a man's <WH120> hands <WH3027> shall be rendered <WH7725> <WH7725> unto him.
The way <WH1870> of a fool <WH191> is right <WH3477> in his own eyes <WH5869>: but he that hearkeneth <WH8085> unto counsel <WH6098> is wise <WH2450>.
A fool's <WH191> wrath <WH3708> is presently <WH3117> known <WH3045>: but a prudent <WH6175> man covereth <WH3680> shame <WH7036>.
He that speaketh <WH6315> truth <WH530> sheweth forth <WH5046> righteousness <WH6664>: but a false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> deceit <WH4820>.
There is <WH3426> that speaketh <WH981> like the piercings <WH4094> of a sword <WH2719>: but the tongue <WH3956> of the wise <WH2450> is health <WH4832>.
The lip <WH8193> of truth <WH571> shall be established <WH3559> for ever <WH5703>: but a lying <WH8267> tongue <WH3956> is but for a moment <WH7280>.
Deceit <WH4820> is in the heart <WH3820> of them that imagine <WH2790> evil <WH7451>: but to the counsellers <WH3289> of peace <WH7965> is joy <WH8057>.
There shall no evil <WH205> happen <WH579> to the just <WH6662>: but the wicked <WH7563> shall be filled <WH4390> with mischief <WH7451>.
Lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193> are abomination <WH8441> to the LORD <WH3068>: but they that deal <WH6213> truly <WH530> are his delight <WH7522>.
A prudent <WH6175> man <WH120> concealeth <WH3680> knowledge <WH1847>: but the heart <WH3820> of fools <WH3684> proclaimeth <WH7121> foolishness <WH200>.
The hand <WH3027> of the diligent <WH2742> shall bear rule <WH4910>: but the slothful <WH7423> shall be under tribute <WH4522>.
Heaviness <WH1674> in the heart <WH3820> of man <WH376> maketh it stoop <WH7812>: but a good <WH2896> word <WH1697> maketh it glad <WH8055>.
The righteous <WH6662> is more excellent <WH8446> than his neighbour <WH7453>: but the way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> seduceth <WH8582> them.
The slothful <WH7423> man roasteth <WH2760> not that which he took in hunting <WH6718>: but the substance <WH1952> of a diligent <WH2742> man <WH120> is precious <WH3368>.
In the way <WH734> of righteousness <WH6666> is life <WH2416>; and in the pathway <WH5410> <WH1870> thereof there is no death <WH4194>.
